			<script type="text/javascript">
				function trace(w){if(window['console']) console.info(w);}
				function $(w){return document.getElementById(w);}
				
				var global = {
					root_url: 'http://SERVER/',
					version: '1'
				};
					
				function sendActivity(str){
					if(OSData.user.isOwner()){
						OSData.app.activity.send({
							title: str,
							text: ""
						});	
					}
				}
				
				function init(){
					try {
						OSData.app.dataToRequest.FRIENDS = true;
						//OSData.user.owner.friends.FILTER = "has_app";
						OSData.user.owner.friends.MAX = 5000;
						OSData.onComplete = function(){
							sendDataToESPN();
						}
						OSData.init()
					} catch (e){
					}
				}
				
				try {
					gadgets.window.adjustHeight();
				} catch(E){}
				
				gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(init);
				
			</script>
